review:
My 28th Dentist proved lucky.
Well to elaborate my lifetime experience I would start with a big hug and thanks to whole team of Dr Sourabh Nagpal and bow to acknowledge there hard work and understanding while treating me. I know doctor I was a hard patient to treat on but trust me back home my dentist in California used to just avoid treating me thereby making me further suffer and I was all through paranoid with dentists. Thanks for making the difference.
I mean it really worked so well here that I can't thank you so easily. At one time in my life I thought I would die of dental problems as I was on medicines heavily and never use to be able to cooperate with my dentist. 

Being a frequent traveller I can say I have been to more dentists than restaurants in my life. Out of list of 27 dentists(according to list with my secretary from 15 countries )All used to blame me as a bad patient.
I was reffered to your clinic by concierge of Hotel ITC Maurya (probably well known hotel in new delhi). The person at help desk was so sure about you that he said that's one of the best thing he can offer me in New Delhi.
My wife specially flew from The United States once she came to know that my treatment is going on with you people as it was unbelievable thing for her. She supported me in making it worth and Shaped it to suit me. 
In the end I would surely like to thanks your wife Dr Poonam Nagpal as most competent lady dentist I came across. Never in hurry but always makes thing according to patient on chair. I still remember I took good long hours just to take my first anaesthesia from her but that changed me totally and turned me cooperative. 
Honestly your dental office is at par with standards(what I was able to see) of clinic in States, just the difference is that dentists out there act very pricey and you people behave very humble which is important  and is probably your best quality. 
I promise to do best of arrangements for you if you plan to visit us in Beverly Hills anytime.

review:
Dr Nagpal's profile was shortlisted along with 3 more dentists as best available in Delhi by my sister residing in Delhi for my treatment as I specially dripped in from united states to get my treatment done as I very well know and understand that India is none less than anyone in cricket and in dentistry. For these obvious reasons I thought that I can couple my family trip with opportunity to get my Dental problems fixed. Indeed I ended up selecting Dr Sourabh for my treatment and in long run today i feel it was a beautiful decision. 
* Very good and updated clinic.
*Dentist was able to converse with my routine dentist in states and was infact able to convince him for his decision for treatment. Though my family dentist is far more older than Dr Nagpal, but he acknowledged that I am in safe hands as work once evaluated after completion was flawless.
* During my treatment appointment I came across patients of various nationalities, atleast 14-16 who were utterly satsified on previous occasions and were regular patients at Matrix clinic. This further gave me confidence,as for me Dr Sourabh was very young.
*My motive was to get good friendly treatment as overtime I felt that my dentist in Chicago was over charging unnecessarily and was still not giving sufficient time and attention too,probably bcoz of over occupancy. But I wasn't in any crisis situation while being on Dr Nagpal's dental office. Infact I was more comfortable than ever.
*Brands of implants and materials were used as per my satisfaction and I opted for best availables.
*Punctuality in completing and committing appointments was very impressive as even after some bottle necks doc was able to complete my treatment in time frame as was committed.
*Cost structuring was quite transparent as same was discussed in email too and was on website clearly displayed.
*All in total I was able to get best and according to my satisfaction. 
*My recommendation for Dr Sourabh Nagpal  is based on my personal experience, follow up of months and a complete check up by my specialist back home. So that's make me feel that my views can be of help to other patients of Dr Nagpal. 
Regards
Paul M.

Motive to write this review is that someone reading this review shall get a good idea of my first hand experience of getting treatment from Dr Sourabh Nagpal. To get such a thing before your wedding photography is a dream for every gal like me but doc made it true and easy for me. #SmileDesign at its best I would quote.

** *** **** ** ********** ******* **** ******** ******* ***** ****** ** *** ****** **** ***** ******* ** *** ***** *** **** * ***** *********** ***** **** *** ** ****** **** * ****** ***** *** * ****** ******** ** **** ******** *** ** *** *** * **** ****** Now, that's only the first part of the process. 

He is also not very transparent about the charges either. Now you will ask how much you will have to dish out for that and he will display a chart that says an X amount. And you will think that's how much I am spending for it. But wait, that's only the token amount. He will keep bringing additional charges for various stages of the root canal process. For instance after 3 visits, he will say something like" now i will have to insert a fiber support to strengthen your teeth. That will cost an additional 6K or something". If that was a part of the root canal process that should already have been included in the bill amount.

Anyways, now is the time for crowning. Either you opt for a metallic crown or a ceramic. I opted for the ceramic one with a 5 years warranty. But when it was time for me to get the crown fitted, he said "the 5 year cover has recently become invalid so I have made the 10 year plan for you. This will cost you 3K extra". I didn't make much of a fuss about it back then because it was already at the back of my mind to go for the years plan. But still I felt like he should have at least given me a prior update and taken my consent before going ahead with the new plan. What if I wasn't willing to dish away the additional charges? 

Now after almost 3 months I still feel although very minimal but still some kind of a sensitivity in my crowning area. I also opted for deep cleaning. Even here he chose to give a miss to those areas where it's not visible. And now as I got a reminder from Matrix Dental Clinic via Practo for a routine/follow up check I decided to review the place and inform that I don't know about others but "I am finding another dentist for my future visits". 

I am still giving it a 2 rather than 1 star because the receptionist was a 
cooperative and sensible lady.

Trust me docsaab I haven't seen a better dentist than you. 
For my treatment some advised wires, some even extractions with wires, some money minters guided me for invisible braces and layer I came to know I wasn't a case for that. 
You are the only I found was genuinely bothered about me as well as my money. Surely I can stand in front of your Clinic for a month to tell everyone that this is most worthy dentist in Delhi. 
Earlier I thought you are young and must be less experienced "but sir your abilities can give you success in any work atleast in dentistry, believe me I rate you better than any specialist I met in my life . 
Root canaling, crowning and what all you touched is now a master piece. 
I conceptualised and you did it, that's what I can say. 
# I searched you through my online search and got you through Practo and it was ritely guided. 
##Your Clinic and staff and doctors all are very good.
Probably this is the reason why your all patients praise a lot. I met atleast 15-20 during my visits.

Hello Doc Nagpal Saurabh I Was reffered by my colleague from Embassy as he is a previous patient of yours Dr Nagpal. He praised about you a lot as your work done on him was appreciated by our common dentist in Zürich. So we take you as our dentist in India. Trust us as in our Swiss Embassy staff we get trusted doctors list and your name is unanimously opted as single dentist who helped many of us through services from your Matrix Clinic. Recently many staff members shifted back home but new one poured in to be equally comfortable with you and your wife Dr Nagpal Poonam. Clean and hygienic Clinic like you made was preference for us and more importantly good treatment. Your website also helped us with cost estimates and everything done suited everyone of us. We thanks you from core of our heart. Frankly it was very difficult when I sat first on your chair, but that day and today I am a big fan of your Clinic. My reason for being scared on day one was my visit at a new dentist all together in a new country and what not, but you prooved me wrong and handled everything professionaly. Big thanks.

Special thanks to Dr Nagpal and Mrs Dr Nagpal.
My treatment of Full Mouth Dental implant with Zirconia caps is surely a turning point in my life. It has definitely changed the way I look,speak, eat and smile. I was suffering from tooth problem since my childhood and by the age of 40 I was in bad shape. Though such a condition is common in Riyadh but I wanted better life and searched on net about different places in world to get good dental treatment. Places shortlisted included Dr Nagpal's place also in New Delhi India. After my enquiry one translator was arranged to interact with me from a good university who served great. I came to India twice for first stage and second stage at a gap of around 5 months. 
Treatment I opted was All on Four Dental Implants 

In my first visit all teeth were removed and replaced with implants and temporary teeth over it. Surgery went comfortably and gave me ease of eating though appearance was just ok.
In my second visit temporary teeth were replaced with permanent Zirconia teeth. Helped me in getting my dream Hollywood Smile.

All my treatment is ok and satisfactory. Dr Nagpal is not only good implanologist but also very understanding and caring. I wish all doctors treat there patients like Dr Sourabh Nagpal.

Regards 

Khaled IbrahimG

review: As a New patient searching for a good dentist, I found Dr Nagpal as most competent after visiting three more dentists for solution towards my rotten teeth which was worsening with time. Sir guided me in most economical way and still better than as I was advised elsewhere. All the time during treatment I was scared and with fingers crossed but honestly it was easier than I imagined. I really don't know why other dentists were making me feel scared when it was easily manageable. I am writing this review in sincere spirit and hope that I won't face any problem in future. Doc assured me that caps given are with warranties so I am all ends secured.

Dr Sourabh Nagpal came in late without an apology. We sat waiting at the reception without any intimation about his arrival at the clinic. When he saw me, he was right about the diagnosis and gave a good recommendation. However, his receptionist, Dr. Priyanka (I have no idea what kind of a doctor she is) was awful in communication, comprehension and also follow up. I asked her to mail my tooth X-ray and she obliged after repeated reminders that too were really poor quality. She committed to call me about appointment with their visiting doctor who would have done the extraction for me but she never followed up or bothered mailing me. she was unable to comprehend my situation even. I have no idea what is she doing there?!! I never got a chance to experience their services but Dr Priyanka is certainly bad for their 'business'.

A word of thanks out of satisfactory Dental treatment received from Dr Nagpal. Just writing to say you that your nice handling helped me to get my dental treatment started and today it's complete without any last minute hitch. Stay what you are Dr Sourabh ,coz it would take consistent efforts of yours for few more years and then whole world will pour into your Clinic. You are a great dentist and even a worhtier human being. I still can't believe how easily you convinced me on your chair the first day when I dropped in for emergency pain in my tooth and jaw.

Everyone asked me for braces which was impossible to proceed coz of my marriage this month. Saurabh sir gave me crowns and caps for front teeth and filled all gaps and I myself can't make it up whether they are false teeth or original. I mean I wonder why I wasn't suggested such treatment earlier. It was at 11 hour only we went on to go with this treatment and my biggest worry was my gaps in smile that would come in wedding pics. Now I won't be conscious at all. Three cheers and hats off to Nagpal's Clinic for such wonderful result and work done with perfection.

Overall, a great facility with very professional staff and a great doctor. Definitely and highly recommended.

Just when I thought that braces were impossible stuff for me, that's the time I came across Dr Sourabh Nagpal after intensive search on net for a extremely competent dentist for my front tooth gap treatment. I am so so delighted and literally feel him as an angel who served me in hard times and gave me a hundred time nicer smile than the one I had coz of gaps I. Fornt teeth. All work done that included root canals and caps were perfect t to best of my knowledge. Extremely competent is this dentist with vast experience in such a young age. I surely believe now he is among finest dentists in India.

Sourabh sir, You are an artist sir. I pray to god that you be among most successful dentists of delhi and infact you are already one, I wish you achieve heights never attained before. Getting treatment from you was a lucky sign. My channel signed me for reporting the day you completed my cosmetic Dental treatment of front teeth. My portfolio went perfect and even my photographers appreciated your efforts to such an extent that you gonna get lot more people like me now on. I can not thank you in words ever.

I am old patient of this Clinic and experience of last 5-6 yrs gives a feel that you people are best in capital of India and we need not search for any other dentist or Skin Clinic in entire life of ours. I really mean it Dr Nagpal.
I am not in a position to list out positives of your Clinic but surely no negative I came across. A piece of advice - You can utilize your courtyard area by making some sitting arrangement with a canopy. As in winters that's best place to sit while waiting or when you are yourself not a patient but accompanying one.

My liking of Matrix dental clinic seriously is after research of around two to three months of visits to various dentists in delhi in which I accompanied either my family member or a pal intentionally. Motive always was to find a good and capable dentist in the capital and most importantly best hygiene maintenance. Obviously my expectations were as would be of any patient but normally people tend to forget all these things and Dr Nagpal's Matrix dental was the only place along with one more which I found really worthy, but since Dr Sourabh Nagpal's dental office was close to my office so it served me best. Today after my treatment I feel it was a very good choice.

Perfect dentist for dental implant treatment, I got five dental implants at one go and I was comfortable throughout my surgery.
